product_description:
Discover fresh, flavorful, and juicy Little Salad Bar Mango Slices from ALDI. Packaged and pre-peeled, these mango slices make a convenient snack for any time of day. Enjoy alone, in a fruit salad, or even add to recipes such as mango salsa. 
Mangoes are rich in antioxidants and fiber, making them a healthy choice all year round. 
Shop all of our fresh and delicious fruit from ALDI next time you stop in!

Fill your home's fruit bowl with these fresh Limes from ALDI! Each juicy lime is packed with Vitamin C and antioxidants to support your immune system. Use yours to elevate homemade guacamole, add a burst of citrus to your morning smoothie, or put the perfect finishing touch on a flavorful mojito!

Shop for fresh watermelon from ALDI. Watermelon is a refreshing summer treat that can be enjoyed alone, in salads, and even blended in a delicious fruit smoothie. However you choose to enjoy, discover fresh produce and fruit options at an ALDI near you. 

How to Pick a Watermelon

When selecting a watermelon, choose a symmetrical one with dried stems and yellowish undersides. Watermelons should be dark green in color and relatively heavy in size.

At ALDI, we always offer fresh and affordable produce. Shop for sweet and juicy Lemons to add into drinks, sauces, or even use for decor. Grab a bag of lemons to have on hand next time you stop in. 
Learn more about lemon tips and benefits today. 
Lemon Tips
• The vitamin C in lemons can help keep your hair flowing and skin glowing.
• Lemons are a great way to add flavor to a dish while reducing salt content. Add them to salads, fish or poultry for a zing of flavor.
Selecting Tips
• Choose lemons with smooth, thin and firm skin.

Shop for fresh Anjou Pears from ALDI and discover the juicy delicious taste for yourself. Anjou pears are packed with vitamins and minerals that are important to keep you healthy.  
Enjoy the sweet and fresh taste of our Anjou Pears on their own or paired with cheese, baked in pies, used in salads, and more.  
However you choose to enjoy, shop ALDI for our fresh and affordable produce. Discover all of our quality products next time you stop in.

Brighten up your next fruit salad with a bag of fresh Kiwis from ALDI. The super juicy green fruit has a slightly tart taste that pairs well with sweeter fruits like strawberries and watermelon. Snack on one by itself, juice it for a tasty punch, or add some slices to a summer salad for a burst of flavor.

ALDI Mandarins are fresh and bursting with sweet flavor. Because of their small size, they are perfect for a grab-and-go option. They are easy to peel and make for a great kids snack that you can feel good about. Try one today.

Get a delicious boost of Vitamin C with these fresh Navel Oranges from ALDI. The juicy, tangy fruit is the perfect immune booster to keep you going during the colder months. Add it to your breakfasts, lunch salads, or afternoon snack, or squeeze out the juice for a refreshing drink.

These fresh Avocados from ALDI are the ultimate versatile veggie! Each ripe avocado is packed with healthy fats, fiber, and antioxidants to support your body and help you stay strong. Try this fan-favorite vegetable on top of a crispy slice of toast, in a loaded deli sandwich, or in spicy, creamy guacamole at your next party!

Discover refreshing and juicy strawberries from ALDI. Strawberries are a sweet and flavorful fruit to enjoy alone, in dessert recipes such as strawberry shortcake, or on top of yogurt or ice cream.  
However you choose to enjoy, discover all of our delicious and fresh fruit options at affordable prices when you shop at an ALDI near you. 

How to pick strawberries
When choosing strawberries, ensure they are shiny, firm and bright red. The caps should be fresh, green and intact.

Shop for fresh and flavorful Blackberries. Blackberries are packed with flavor and delicious alone or in recipes. Add blackberries to fruit salads, your morning oatmeal, blended in smoothies and more. Even use blackberries to make cookies or muffins. When selecting blackberries, they should be shiny, a deep purple or black color, and firm. Explore all our tasty and fresh fruit and berry options at affordable prices when you shop with us.

Pineapple lovers unite! Whether you typically enjoy this tasty fruit on its own or on pizza, there are many nutritional benefits. According to the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, pineapples are free of fats and cholesterol. They're also very low in sodium and high in vitamin C. Enjoy alone, in a smoothie, on top of ice cream or even in a pineapple cake.

How to Pick a Good Pineapple:
•Pick pineapples that have green, fresh-looking leaves. When ripe, leaves should be easy to remove. They should be heavy and have a sweet pineapple aroma.

No produce drawer is complete without these Organic Avocados from ALDI! The fresh avocados are packed with healthy fats, fiber, and antioxidants to support your health. Use yours to make flavorful guacamole, loaded avocado toast, or a nutritious veggie wrap!

A cantaloupe's color and sweet taste make it the perfect addition to appetizers, salads, breakfast dishes, and even dessert. Not only are they a delicious treat during those hot summer months, but they can also be used all year round. Add cantaloupe slices into your next fruit salad or enjoy alone and discover the delicious taste for yourself. When choosing a cantaloupe, they should be fragrant, symmetrical, and heavy with no visible bruises. Explore all of our fresh and affordable fruit options on your next shopping trip.

No fruit bowl is complete without these fresh Honeycrisp Apples from ALDI! The sweet, crisp apples are packed with fiber and potassium to support your health. Enjoy yours on their own or in a cozy apple pie with your favorite warm spices!

Gala apples are a sweet and healthy choice all year round. ALDI's apples are always ripe and full of flavor. Use to make delicious and sweet apple pie, pair with peanut butter for a filling snack, or enjoy alone. Grab a few on your next shopping trip!

Produce Tips
Ripe, full color apples are great for eating. Older apples that are past ripe and a bit mushy work well for baking.

Selecting Tips

Pick apples that are firm, shiny and smooth with intact stems.

They should smell fresh and not musty.

One of the sweetest varieties of apples, these fresh Fuji Apples from ALDI are the perfect choice for baking fall pies or strudels. The crisp red-yellow skin delivers a satisfying crunch with every bite, giving way to the tender fruit inside. Slice an apple up to dip in caramel or peanut butter or stick to the baked goods and whip up a delicious apple crisp.

These Organic Gala Apples from ALDI are the perfect snack any time of day! The fresh apples are packed with Vitamin C and fiber to support your health. Enjoy yours on their own or with a spoonful of peanut butter for a delicious and nutritious treat!

Looking for a healthy and flavorful snack? Discover juicy and fresh blueberries at ALDI during your next visit. Blueberries are great served alone, in a fruit salad, in breakfast muffins, or even in desserts such as a blueberry cake. 
We make sure that all of our produce is fresh, high quality and affordable. Discover all of our fresh fruit options at an ALDI near you. 
Selecting Tips
Choose firm, plump and dry blueberries that have a dusty blue color and are all relatively the same size.

Discover fresh raspberries from ALDI. Perfect to enjoy alone as a flavorful and sweet snack, they are also a great addition to many recipes such as muffins, cakes, and more. 
Discover all of our delicious produce options when you shop at an ALDI near you. 

Selecting Tips

Make sure raspberries are dry, plump and firm.

These fresh Fancy Medjool Dates are the perfect grab-and-go whole fruit snack for busy days. With a rich, caramel taste and a soft, chewy texture, they’re a delicious and better-for-you snack option you can enjoy any time of day. Have them on their own, wrapped in bacon, stuffed with cheese, or chopped into cookies or granola bars.

Brighten up a summer salad or just enjoy a juicy snack with fresh Strawberries from ALDI. These ripe red berries are packed with a subtly sweet flavor you'll love. Use them to create a homemade jam or dip them in melted dark chocolate for an indulgent treat.

Pick up fresh, Red Delicious Apples on your next trip to ALDI. These apples can be enjoyed on their own or added to a variety of dishes. Use Red Delicious apples in homemade apple cider, baked apples, apple crumble, apple pie, applesauce, and so much more. You can even juice these apples to make a delicious drink.

Discover all of our affordable fresh fruit options at an ALDI near you.

Fresh Pink Lady Apples from ALDI pack a sweet and tart taste in every bite. This refreshing apple can be enjoyed alone, in delicious and sweet apple pies, or even on top of salads. Learn more below. 

Produce Tips
Ripe, full color apples are great for eating. Older apples that are past ripe and a bit mushy work well for baking.

Selecting Tips
Pick apples that are firm, shiny and smooth with intact stems.
They should smell fresh and not musty.

Granny Smith  Apples are a sweet and healthy snack all year round. Enjoy alone or dipped in peanut butter, caramel, or even in dessert and salad recipes. 

Discover more Granny Smith apple tips today. 

Apple Tips

•Ripe, full color apples are great for eating. Older apples that are past ripe and a bit mushy work well for baking.

Apple Picking Tips
•Pick apples that are firm, shiny and smooth with intact stems.
•They should smell fresh and not musty.
